MAP OF GREATER BALTIMORE

BALTIMORE IN BRIEF

Area, Total Square Miles

City Population (1940 Census) i 859,100

Metropolitan Population (1940 Census) 1,046,692

POINTS OF INTEREST

Baltimore Museum of Art—Charles and 31st St.

Carroll Mansion (Homewood)—North Charles and 33rd St.

Catholic Cathedral-—-Cathedral and Mulberry Sts.

Druid Hill Park—End of Madison Ave.

Enoch Pratt Free Library—Cathedral, Mulberry to Franklin

Federal Hill--Key Highway

Fifth Regiment Armory—West Hoffman and Bolton Sts.

Flag House-—East Pratt and Albemarle Sts.

Fort McHenry—End of East Eort Avenue

I'riends Meeting House (1781)-—East Fayette and Aisquith Sts.

Johns Hopkins Hospital —Broadway and East Monument St.

Kcy, Francis Scott, Monuments—Eutaw Place and Lanvale St.
-—-Fort McHenry

Maryland Historical Society—201 W. Monument St.

Mount Clare Station (First Railroad Station in America)—
West Pratt near Schroeder Sts.

Municipal Museum (Peale’s)—Holliday between Lexington
and Saratoga Sts.

Old St. Paul’s Church—North Charles and Saratoga Sts.

Peabody Conservatory of Music-— Mt, Vernon Place and
Charles St.

Pimlico Race Track--Belvedere and Park Heights Aves.

Poe, Edgar Allan-- Westminster Church, Fayette & Greene

Shot Tower -Ilast Fayetie Street near Fallsway

Walters Art Gallery—-Charles and Centre Sts.

War Memorial- Gay, Fayette and Lexington Sts.

Washington Monument---Charles and Mt. Vernon Place

PARKS AND SQUARES

Broening—Foot Hanover St. i

Carroll Park—Bayard St., Washington Blvd., Gwynns Falls

City Springs—Lombard and Eden Sts.

Civic Square—City Hall Plaza

Clifton Park—Harford and Belair Aves.

Collington Square—Chester, Preston, Patterson Park and
Hoffman Sts.

Druid Hill Park—Madison Ave.

Easterwood Park—Bentalou and Presstman Sts.

Federal Hill Park—Battery Ave., Key Highway, Covington
and Warren Ave,

Fort Armistead Park—end Hawkins Pt. Road, Curtis Bay

Fort McHenry—Foot E. Fort Ave,

Franklin Square—Fayette, Carey, Lexington and Calhoun Sts.

Gwynns Falls Park—Windsor Mill Road

Harlem Park—-Gilmor, Calhoun, Edmondson and Harlem Ave.

Herring Run Park—extending from Hillen to Philadelphia
Roads

Johnston Square—Chase, Valley, Biddle and Homewood Ave.

Lafayette Square—Lafayette, Carrollton, Lanvale and
Arlington Ave.

Latrobe Park—Fort Ave., Andre, Latrobe and B & O R.R.

Madison Square—Chase, Eden, Caroline and Eager Sts.

New Reservoir Park—Liberty Road

Patterson Park-—Patterson Park Ave., Baltimore, Eastern
and Linwood Aves.

Perkins Spring Square—George, Myrtle and Clinton Sts.
Preston Place—St. Paul bet. Lexington and Centre Sts.
Riverside Park—Randall, Johnson, Wells and Covington Sts.
Roosevelt Park—Falls Road, 36th and Poole Sts.

Swann Park--From Windsor to Donaldson St.

Union Square—Gilmor, Lombard, Stricker and Holiins Sts.
Venable Park (The Stadium)—33rd and Ellerslie Ave.

Washington and Mt. Vernon Square—Centre to Madison,
St. Paul to Cathedral Sts.

Wyman Park--Charles St. and University Parkway

Solid circle designates Center of City
and divides North, South, East and West

Large Circles are Miles from Post Office
Number denotes Car Lines
Letter denotes Bus Lines









STREET CAR LINE ROUTES

No. 1 Line (Gilmor St—Guilford Av)—Park Terminal Station
(Fulton and Druid Hill Av) : Fulton av, Lanvale, Gilmor,
Fayette, Guilford av, North av, St. Paul, Twenty-fifth to
Greenmount av. Returning, same route.

No. 2 Line (Carey St—Fort Av)—Druid Hill and Fulton avs:
Pennsylvania av, Cumberland, Carey, Mosher, Carrollton
av, Baltimore, Charles, Fort av, to Fort McHenry. Return-
ing, Fort av, Charles, Lee, Hanover, Baltimore, Carrollton
av, Fayette, Carey, Cumberland, Pennsylvania av, to Druid
Hill and Fulton avs.

No. 4 Line (Edmondson Av)—Windsor Hills: Clifton av, Den-
nison, North av, Bloomingdale rd, Poplar Grove (Cal-
verton), Edmondson av, Fremont av, Saratoga, Charles to
Lexingten st. Returning same route.

No. 5 Line (Pimlico Line)—Baltimore St. and Patterson Park
Av: Patterson Park av, Pratt, Exeter, Lombard, Paca,
Druid Hill av, Fulton, Reisterstown rd, Park Heights av,
to Manhattan av loop. Buses from Belvedere loop to
Owings Mills, Reisterstown, through Glyndon.

No. 6 Line (Curtis Bay and Monument)—Curtis Bay Terminus :
Private right-of-way, Curtis av, Patapsco av, Hanover
(Brooklyn), Hanover St. bridge, Hanover, Heath, Light,
Baltimore, Holliday, Hillen, Monument, to Kresson st.
Returning over same route. Fairfield Extension (Loop) :
Patapsco av, Fairfield av, Chesapeake av, Sun, then over
private right-of-way to Patapsco av, to Pennington av.

No. 8 Line (Towson and Catonsville)—Towson Court House,
Washington av, Chesapeake av, York rd, Greenmount av,
Forrest, Hillen, Holliday, Fayette, Gilmor, Lombard,
Frederick av, passing Carroll and Irvington to Catons-
ville Junction. Returning, same route to Pratt, Gilmor,
Fayette, then over same route as above to York rd, Penn-
sylvania av. to Washington av, Towson Court House.

No. 9 and 14 Lines (Ellicott City)—Charles and Saratoga
Sts: Charles, Lexington, Park, Saratoga, Monroe,
Edmondson Ave., then over private right-of-way to
Rolling Road and Ellicott City. Returning same route
to Charles and Saratoga Sts.

No. 10 Line (Roland Park and Highlandtown—Trackless Trol-
ley)—Roland Pk Water Tower Loop: Roland av, 86th,
Chestnut, 33rd, Remington, 27th, Howard, Pratt, Exeter,
Stiles, Lloyd, Gough, Broadway, Eastern av, to Haven.
Returning via same route.

No. 11 (Guilford)-—Bedford Square, Gixilford, St. Paul, North
av, Guilford av, Fayette, Gilmor, Lanvale, Fulton av. to
Park Terminal Station. Returning via same route.

No. 13 Line (North Av)— Milten Av Branch: Milton av and
North av: North av, Dennison, Clifton av, to Garrison
blvd (Walbrook Junction). Returning via same route.
Wolfe Street Branch: Clifton and Garrison blvd (Wal-
brook Junction)-—Clifton, Dennison, North av, Washing-
ton, Chase, Wolfe to Aliceanna. Returning, Aliceanna,
Ann, Eastern av, to Wolfe, then over same route as above.

No. 15 Line (Gay St and Belair Road)—W. Baltimore Loop ;
Baltimore, Gay, Belair Road, passing Clifton Park, Gar-
denville, Anthonyville, Raspeburg, Belvieu and Belgravia,
to Overlea av, Overlea. Returning, Belair Road, Gay,
Ashland av, Ensor, Gay to W. Baltimore Loop.

No. 16 Line (Madison Av)---Druid Hill Park (Madison Av.
Gate) : Madison av, Eutaw, Baltimore, Broadway to foot
of Broadway. Returning, same route.

No. 17 Line (St. Paul St-Westport)—Harford Av and Abbotts-'
ton: Abbottston, Kirk, Gorsuch, Greenmount, 31st, St.
Paul, North, Charles, Read, Calvert, Baltimore, Sharp,
Camden, Paca, Fremont, Ridgely, across Harmen’s Bridge,
Annapolis rd, Westport. Returning over same route to
Camden and Eutaw, Eutaw to Baltimore, Calvert, then
over same route to Harford av.

No. 18 Line (Pennsylvania Av)—Cumberland St. and North
Av: Cumberland st, Pennsylvania av, Greene, Baltimore,
Paca, Lombard, High, Pratt, Exeter, Stiles, Gough, Broad-
way, Eastern av, Patterson Park av, Essex, Fait av,
Kenwood av. One branch going via Hudson, Conkling,
Toone, Clinton, Elliott, Kenwood av. The other branch
continuing on Kenwood av, Elliott, Clinton, Toone, Conk-
ling, Hudson, back to Kenwood av; both branches return-
ing from Kenwood av and Hudson via same route to
Gough, Lloyd, Pratt, Exeter, Lombard, Paca, Baltimore,
Greene, Pennsylvania av, Cumberland to North av.

No. 19 Line (Harford Av)—Sharp and ‘Ostend: Sharp, Lee,
Hanover, Redwood, South, Baltimore, Aisquith, Madison,
Central av, Harford av, to Taylor av terminus of city

cars. Returning, same route to Redwood, Sharp, West,

Leadenhall to Ostend and Sharp.
This line connects at Lavender av with the Carney line.

No. 20 Line (Highlandtown-Point Breeze)—Eastern Av and
Haven: Eastern av, Oldham, Keith av, to Point Breeze.
Returning via same route. :

No. 21 Line (Preston St—Caroline St—Trackless Trolley)—
Carey St and Westwood Av: Westwood av, Calhoun, Gil-
mor, Lanvale, Arlington av, Harlem av, Dolphin, Brevard,
Preston, Caroline, Aliceanna, Bond, Eastern av. Return-
ing Eastern av and Caroline, over same route to Gilmor,

- Cumberland to Westwood av and Carey.

No. 24 Line (Lakeside)—Water Tower Loop, Roland av,
to Lake av, then over private right-of-way to Lakeside.
Returning, same route.

25 Line (Mt. Washington)-—Camden and Howard Sts.:
Howard, Liberty, Park av, Biddle, Maryland av, 256th,
Huntingdon av, 88rd, Chestnut av, 36th, Falls rd, across
viaduct to Mt. Washington Station, then over private
right-of-way, Kelly av, Cross Country blvd to Ken Oak
rd, Pimlico av, Belvedere av, passing Pimlico Race Track
to Belvedere av loop. Returning same route to Liberty
and Lombard to Sharp, Camden to Howard.

Union Av Extension, 36th and Roland Av (Hampden) :
36th, Falls Road, Union av, to Jones’ Falls (West Wood-
berry). Returning, same route.

Mt. Washington-Key Av Extension: Mt. Washington
Station, private right-of-way to Cheswolde rd.

No. 26 Line (Sparrows Point)—Fayette and Pearl Sts: Fayette,
Holliday, Baltimore, Wolfe, Fairmount av, East av, Balti-
more, Conkling, Lombard, Grundy, Eastern av, via cut-off
to St. Helena, Dundalk, Logan Field, and across Bear
Creek bridge to 4th, D, 11th, Sparrows Point, then over
private right-of-way to Ft. Howard. Returning same route
(Haven between Eastern av and Lombard) to Baltimore,
Gay, Fayette, Greene, Baltimore, Pearl to Fayette.

. 27 Line (Morrell Park—Trackless Trolley)—Washington
blvd, Paca, Camden, Howard, Preston, to Aisquith.

Federal St. Branch—Aisquith, Federal to Federal and
Luzerne av.

East Biddle St. Branch—Aisquith and Preston: Preston :
East av, Biddle, Edison highway, Preston. Returning—
Edison Highway and Preston: over Preston st, then over
same route to Morrell Park as above.

No. 29 Line (Roland Park-Boulevard)—Calvert and Pratt Sts:
Calvert, Read, Charles, North, St. Paul, University pkwy,
Roland av to Roland Car House. Returning same route as
above to Lombard, South, Pratt to Calvert.

30 Line (Fremont Av)—Charles St and Lafayette Av:
Maryland av, North av, McMechen, Division, Mosher, Fre-
mont av, Hamburg, Charles, Barney, Patapsco, Heath to
Charles. Returning, same route to North av, Charles st,
Lafayette av.

No.

<

No.

S

N

=

. 31 Line (Garrison Boulevard)—Belvedere Loop: Belvedere
av, Belvieu av, (West Arlington), Garrison blvd, (Forest
Park), Clifton av, (Walbrook Ject.), Dennison, North av,
Madison av, Eutaw, Redwood, Calvert, Lombard to South.
Returning, South, Redwood, then same route as above.
Sunday Route only—Belvedere av Loop (Arlington): Bel-
vedere av, Belvieu av, (West Arlington), Garrison Boule-
vard (Forest Park), Clifton av, (Walbrook Jct.), Dennison,
North av, Washington, Chase, Wolfe, to Aliceanna St.
Retyurning Aliceanna, Ann, Eastern av, to Wolfe st, North
av, then via same route.

. 32 Line (Woodlawn)—Woodlawn: Gwynn Oak av, Liberty
Heights av, Reisterstown rd, Fulton av, Druid Hill av,
Whitelock, Linden av, Biddle, Read, Park av, Liberty,
Howard, Camden, Sharp, Conway, Light, to Lee—then
Hanover, Conway, then over same route northbound as
above.

No. 33 Line (West Arlington)—Same as No. 5 line from Cal-
vert and Lombard sts to Belvedere and Park Heights
avs, thence via Belvedere, Belvieu, Gwynn Oak avs to
Liberty Heights av, (Gwynn Oak Jct.). ‘

- 34 Line (Canton—Wolfe St)—North Av and Washington
St: Washington, Chase, Wolfe, Eastern av, Patterson
Park av, Essex, Fait av, Kenwood av, Elliott, Clinton,
Toone, Conkling, Eastern av, Oldham. Returning same
route.

No. 35 Line (Walbrook—Hillsdale—Lorraine)—Clifton Av,
and Garrison Blvd (Walbrook Ject.): Clifton av, over
private right-of-way through Windsor Hills to Hillsdale,
over private right-of-way, following Forrest av, (Wetherds-
ville Road), to Windsor Mill Road, Kernans Drive, Logwood
Road, to Lorraine Cemetery. Returning via same route.

BUS LINE ROUTES

Route A—Charles St. Line—Charles and 39th: Charles, Uni-
versity Parkway, Greenway, Charles, Baltimore, Light,
Redwood, to Charles. Returning, Charles, to University
Parkway, 39th, Charles.

Route B—Mt. Royal Ave. Line—Charles and Baltimore Sts:
Charles, Chase, Cathedral, Mt. Royal av, Lanvale, Park
av, Reservoir. From Park av and Reservoir, one branch
is routed over Reservoir, Brookfield av, Eutaw pl, Clover-
dale av, Madison av to Brooks la, Brookfield av, Reservoir,
to Park av, then south over same route as above to Balti-
more, Light, Redwood, Charles st loop. From Park av
and Reservoir another branch is routed over Reservoir to
Callow av, to Park ter, to Park av, to Reservoir then south
over the same route as above. §

Route C—Alameda Line—Fenwick and 33rd : Fenwick, Chilton,
Alameda blvd, to Harford av. Returning, Harford av,
Tivoly av, 28th, Alameda blvd, 33rd, to Fenwick av.

N

e

z

Route D—Bentalou-Monroe Sts Line—Washington Blvd and
Monroe: Monroe, Ramsay, Payson, Edmondson av, Benta-
lou, Windsor av, Smallwood, Clifton av, Bentalou. Return-
ing over same route to Washington blvd and Monroe. ;

Route E——Randallstown Line—Gwynn Oak and Liberty Heights
Avs: Over Liberty rd to Randallstown.

Route F—Chester St Line—North Av and Chester: North av,
Collington av, Lafayette av, Chester, Madison, Milton av,
McElderry, Linwood av, Baltimore, East av, Elliott,
Clinton to foot of Clinton st, (Newgate av). Returning
same route,

Route G—E Fayette St Line—Lombard and Eaton : Lombard,
Conkling, Baltimore, Ellwood av, Fayette, Holliday, Lex-
ington, Liberty, Cathedral, Centre, to Howard. Returning,
Howard, Fayette, then east over same route.as above.

‘Route H—North Point Road Line—Eastern av and North

Point rd: North Point rd, Sparrows Point rd, to 4th and
D (Sparrows Point). Returning, same route.

Route I-— Dolfield Av Line — Belvieu and Belvedere Avs:
Belvieu, Garrison, Dolfield, Hilton, Gwynns Falls pkwy,
Longwood, Westwood av, North av, Longwood, then
northward.

Route J—Morrell Park-Lansdowne Line—Wade’s Ball Field,
Lansdowne: Hammonds Ferry rd, Washington blvd. to
No. 27 Line terminus, Morrell Park. Returning, same
route,

Route K — Lakeland-Baltimore Highlands-Westport Line —
Annapolis Rd and Annapolis Av (Westport) : Annapolis
av, Hollins Ferry rd, Arbutus av, Annapolis rd, Ohio av,
to Brian av. Returning, Ohio av, Annapolis rd, Arbutus
av, Hollins Ferry rd, Annapolis av, Westport av, Maisel,
to Annapolis rd and Annapolis av.

Route L—Reisterstown Road Line—Park Heights Av and Cold
Spring La: Cold Spring la, Reisterstown rd to Seven Mile
la. Returning, Reisterstown rd, Wylie av, Park Heights
av, to Cold Spring la.

Route of Brighton Branch—Park Heights Av and Cold Spring
La: Reisterstown rd, Patterson av, Parr av, Ridge av,
Brighton av, to Patterson av. Returning, Patterson av,
Reisterstown rd, Wylie av, Park Heights av, to Cold
Spring la.

Route M—Belvedere Loop-Pikesville-Glyndon Line—Belvedere
loop, Belvedere av, Park Heights av, passing Manhattan
loop (terminus No. 5 line) Slade av, Reisterstown rd, to
Owings Mills, Reisterstown, Dover rd, to Glyndon and
Emory Grove. Returning over same route.

Route N—West Baltimore Street Line: one branch—West
Baltimore st loop, Baltimore st, Hilton, Franklin, Den-
nison, Edmondson av, Hilton, Baltimore st, to loop:
another branch—West Baltimore st loop, Baltimore st,
Caton av, Kossuth, Old Frederick rd, Monastery av,
Caton av, Baltimore st, to loop.

Route O-—Homeland Line—St. Paul St and University Park-
way : University Parkway, Charles, St. Albans way, Pad-
dington, Springlake, St. Dunstans, St. Albans way, Bel-
vedere av. Returning, Belvedere av, St. Albans way,
Charles, 39th, St. Paul to University Parkway.

Route P—Back-Middle River Line—Pratt and Grundy Sts:
Grundy St., Eastern Ave., to Middle River Bridge. Re-
turning Eastern Ave.,, Haven, Pratt, to Pratt and
Grundy Sts.

Route Q—Orleans St Viaduct-Halethorpe Line—Halethorpe,
Francis av, Oregon av, East Drive, Linden av, Leeds av,
Wilkins av, Gilmor, Lombard, Liberty, Cathedral, Frank-
lin, over Viaduct, Orleans, Broadway, Monument, Patter-
son Park av, North av, Milton av, Lanvale, Patterson
Park av, Monument, Broadway, Orleans, over Viaduct,
Franklin, Cathedral, Liberty, Redwood, Eutaw, Lombard
to Halethorpe. ‘

Route R—Carney Line—Harford rd and Lavender av to Har-
ford and Joppa rds ; returning same route.

Route S—Liberty Heights Av-Druid Park Dr Line—Druid
Park dr, Hooper, 41st, 40th, University rkwy, 39th, Ellers-
lie, 36th, Ednor, 33rd, 32nd, Harford, Erdman, Edison
highway, Madison, Highland, Bank, Grundy, Eastern,
Conkling, Bank. Returning via same route.

Route T—Northwood Bus Line—Greenmount av and 33rd, east
on 33rd, to Alameda blvd, to Loch Raven blvd, to Pent-
ridge rd. Returning to Loch Raven blvd, to Argonne
drive, to Roundhill rd, to Loch Raven blvd. to Alameda,
to 33rd, to Barclay, to 33rd and Greenmount av terminus.

Route U-—Mannasota Av Line—Belair Rd and Erdman Av:
Belair rd, Mayfield, Mannasota, Parkside, Brehm’s la,
Dudley, Manrasota, Erdman, to Belair rd.

»

Route V-—Armistead Gardens Line—Monument’and Kresson

St. to Philadelphia Rd., to Horner’s Lane (Armistead

Garde_ns) to Leipold Way, to Armistead Way, to Phila-
delphia Rd., to Monument, to Monument and Kresson Sts.

Druid Hill Park—Madison Ave.

Easterwood Park—Bentalou and Presstman Sts.

Federal Hill Park—Battery Ave., Key Highway, Covington

Fort Armistead Park—end Hawkins Pt. Road, Curtis Bay

Fort McHenry—Foot E. Fort Ave,

Franklin Square—Fayette, Carey, Lexington and Calhoun Sts.

Gwynns Falls Park—Windsor Mill Road

Harlem Park—-Gilmor, Calhoun, Edmondson and Harlem Ave.

Roads

Latrobe Park—Fort Ave., Andre, Latrobe and B & O R.R.

STREET CAR LINE ROUTES

No. 1 Line (Gilmor St—Guilford Av)—Park Terminal Station
(Fulton and Druid Hill Av) : Fulton av, Lanvale, Gilmor,
Fayette, Guilford av, North av, St. Paul, Twenty-fifth to
Greenmount av. Returning, same route.

No. 2 Line (Carey St—Fort Av)—Druid Hill and Fulton avs:
Pennsylvania av, Cumberland, Carey, Mosher, Carrollton
av, Baltimore, Charles, Fort av, to Fort McHenry. Return-
ing, Fort av, Charles, Lee, Hanover, Baltimore, Carrollton
av, Fayette, Carey, Cumberland, Pennsylvania av, to Druid
Hill and Fulton avs.

No. 4 Line (Edmondson Av)—Windsor Hills: Clifton av, Den-
nison, North av, Bloomingdale rd, Poplar Grove (Cal-
verton), Edmondson av, Fremont av, Saratoga, Charles to
Lexingten st. Returning same route.

No. 5 Line (Pimlico Line)—Baltimore St. and Patterson Park
Av: Patterson Park av, Pratt, Exeter, Lombard, Paca,
Druid Hill av, Fulton, Reisterstown rd, Park Heights av,
to Manhattan av loop. Buses from Belvedere loop to
Owings Mills, Reisterstown, through Glyndon.

No. 6 Line (Curtis Bay and Monument)—Curtis Bay Terminus :
Private right-of-way, Curtis av, Patapsco av, Hanover
(Brooklyn), Hanover St. bridge, Hanover, Heath, Light,
Baltimore, Holliday, Hillen, Monument, to Kresson st.
Returning over same route. Fairfield Extension (Loop) :
Patapsco av, Fairfield av, Chesapeake av, Sun, then over
private right-of-way to Patapsco av, to Pennington av.

No. 8 Line (Towson and Catonsville)—Towson Court House,
Washington av, Chesapeake av, York rd, Greenmount av,
Forrest, Hillen, Holliday, Fayette, Gilmor, Lombard,
Frederick av, passing Carroll and Irvington to Catons-
ville Junction. Returning, same route to Pratt, Gilmor,
Fayette, then over same route as above to York rd, Penn-
sylvania av. to Washington av, Towson Court House.

No. 9 and 14 Lines (Ellicott City)—Charles and Saratoga
Sts: Charles, Lexington, Park, Saratoga, Monroe,
Edmondson Ave., then over private right-of-way to
Rolling Road and Ellicott City. Returning same route
to Charles and Saratoga Sts.

No. 10 Line (Roland Park and Highlandtown—Trackless Trol-
ley)—Roland Pk Water Tower Loop: Roland av, 86th,
Chestnut, 33rd, Remington, 27th, Howard, Pratt, Exeter,
Stiles, Lloyd, Gough, Broadway, Eastern av, to Haven.
Returning via same route.

No. 11 (Guilford)-—Bedford Square, Gixilford, St. Paul, North
av, Guilford av, Fayette, Gilmor, Lanvale, Fulton av. to
Park Terminal Station. Returning via same route.

No. 13 Line (North Av)— Milten Av Branch: Milton av and
North av: North av, Dennison, Clifton av, to Garrison
blvd (Walbrook Junction). Returning via same route.
Wolfe Street Branch: Clifton and Garrison blvd (Wal-
brook Junction)-—Clifton, Dennison, North av, Washing-
ton, Chase, Wolfe to Aliceanna. Returning, Aliceanna,
Ann, Eastern av, to Wolfe, then over same route as above.

No. 15 Line (Gay St and Belair Road)—W. Baltimore Loop ;
Baltimore, Gay, Belair Road, passing Clifton Park, Gar-
denville, Anthonyville, Raspeburg, Belvieu and Belgravia,
to Overlea av, Overlea. Returning, Belair Road, Gay,
Ashland av, Ensor, Gay to W. Baltimore Loop.

No. 16 Line (Madison Av)---Druid Hill Park (Madison Av.
Gate) : Madison av, Eutaw, Baltimore, Broadway to foot
of Broadway. Returning, same route.

No. 17 Line (St. Paul St-Westport)—Harford Av and Abbotts-'
ton: Abbottston, Kirk, Gorsuch, Greenmount, 31st, St.
Paul, North, Charles, Read, Calvert, Baltimore, Sharp,
Camden, Paca, Fremont, Ridgely, across Harmen’s Bridge,
Annapolis rd, Westport. Returning over same route to
Camden and Eutaw, Eutaw to Baltimore, Calvert, then
over same route to Harford av.

No. 18 Line (Pennsylvania Av)—Cumberland St. and North
Av: Cumberland st, Pennsylvania av, Greene, Baltimore,
Paca, Lombard, High, Pratt, Exeter, Stiles, Gough, Broad-
way, Eastern av, Patterson Park av, Essex, Fait av,
Kenwood av. One branch going via Hudson, Conkling,
Toone, Clinton, Elliott, Kenwood av. The other branch
continuing on Kenwood av, Elliott, Clinton, Toone, Conk-
ling, Hudson, back to Kenwood av; both branches return-
ing from Kenwood av and Hudson via same route to
Gough, Lloyd, Pratt, Exeter, Lombard, Paca, Baltimore,
Greene, Pennsylvania av, Cumberland to North av.

No. 19 Line (Harford Av)—Sharp and ‘Ostend: Sharp, Lee,
Hanover, Redwood, South, Baltimore, Aisquith, Madison,
Central av, Harford av, to Taylor av terminus of city

cars. Returning, same route to Redwood, Sharp, West,

Leadenhall to Ostend and Sharp.
This line connects at Lavender av with the Carney line.

No. 20 Line (Highlandtown-Point Breeze)—Eastern Av and
Haven: Eastern av, Oldham, Keith av, to Point Breeze.
Returning via same route. :

No. 21 Line (Preston St—Caroline St—Trackless Trolley)—
Carey St and Westwood Av: Westwood av, Calhoun, Gil-
mor, Lanvale, Arlington av, Harlem av, Dolphin, Brevard,
Preston, Caroline, Aliceanna, Bond, Eastern av. Return-
ing Eastern av and Caroline, over same route to Gilmor,

- Cumberland to Westwood av and Carey.

No. 24 Line (Lakeside)—Water Tower Loop, Roland av,
to Lake av, then over private right-of-way to Lakeside.
Returning, same route.

25 Line (Mt. Washington)-—Camden and Howard Sts.:
Howard, Liberty, Park av, Biddle, Maryland av, 256th,
Huntingdon av, 88rd, Chestnut av, 36th, Falls rd, across
viaduct to Mt. Washington Station, then over private
right-of-way, Kelly av, Cross Country blvd to Ken Oak
rd, Pimlico av, Belvedere av, passing Pimlico Race Track
to Belvedere av loop. Returning same route to Liberty
and Lombard to Sharp, Camden to Howard.

Union Av Extension, 36th and Roland Av (Hampden) :
36th, Falls Road, Union av, to Jones’ Falls (West Wood-
berry). Returning, same route.

Mt. Washington-Key Av Extension: Mt. Washington
Station, private right-of-way to Cheswolde rd.

No. 26 Line (Sparrows Point)—Fayette and Pearl Sts: Fayette,
Holliday, Baltimore, Wolfe, Fairmount av, East av, Balti-
more, Conkling, Lombard, Grundy, Eastern av, via cut-off
to St. Helena, Dundalk, Logan Field, and across Bear
Creek bridge to 4th, D, 11th, Sparrows Point, then over
private right-of-way to Ft. Howard. Returning same route
(Haven between Eastern av and Lombard) to Baltimore,
Gay, Fayette, Greene, Baltimore, Pearl to Fayette.

. 27 Line (Morrell Park—Trackless Trolley)—Washington
blvd, Paca, Camden, Howard, Preston, to Aisquith.

Federal St. Branch—Aisquith, Federal to Federal and
Luzerne av.

East Biddle St. Branch—Aisquith and Preston: Preston :
East av, Biddle, Edison highway, Preston. Returning—
Edison Highway and Preston: over Preston st, then over
same route to Morrell Park as above.

No. 29 Line (Roland Park-Boulevard)—Calvert and Pratt Sts:
Calvert, Read, Charles, North, St. Paul, University pkwy,
Roland av to Roland Car House. Returning same route as
above to Lombard, South, Pratt to Calvert.

30 Line (Fremont Av)—Charles St and Lafayette Av:
Maryland av, North av, McMechen, Division, Mosher, Fre-
mont av, Hamburg, Charles, Barney, Patapsco, Heath to
Charles. Returning, same route to North av, Charles st,
Lafayette av.

. 31 Line (Garrison Boulevard)—Belvedere Loop: Belvedere
av, Belvieu av, (West Arlington), Garrison blvd, (Forest
Park), Clifton av, (Walbrook Ject.), Dennison, North av,
Madison av, Eutaw, Redwood, Calvert, Lombard to South.
Returning, South, Redwood, then same route as above.
Sunday Route only—Belvedere av Loop (Arlington): Bel-
vedere av, Belvieu av, (West Arlington), Garrison Boule-
vard (Forest Park), Clifton av, (Walbrook Jct.), Dennison,
North av, Washington, Chase, Wolfe, to Aliceanna St.
Retyurning Aliceanna, Ann, Eastern av, to Wolfe st, North
av, then via same route.

. 32 Line (Woodlawn)—Woodlawn: Gwynn Oak av, Liberty
Heights av, Reisterstown rd, Fulton av, Druid Hill av,
Whitelock, Linden av, Biddle, Read, Park av, Liberty,
Howard, Camden, Sharp, Conway, Light, to Lee—then
Hanover, Conway, then over same route northbound as
above.

No. 33 Line (West Arlington)—Same as No. 5 line from Cal-
vert and Lombard sts to Belvedere and Park Heights
avs, thence via Belvedere, Belvieu, Gwynn Oak avs to
Liberty Heights av, (Gwynn Oak Jct.). ‘

- 34 Line (Canton—Wolfe St)—North Av and Washington
St: Washington, Chase, Wolfe, Eastern av, Patterson
Park av, Essex, Fait av, Kenwood av, Elliott, Clinton,
Toone, Conkling, Eastern av, Oldham. Returning same
route.

No. 35 Line (Walbrook—Hillsdale—Lorraine)—Clifton Av,
and Garrison Blvd (Walbrook Ject.): Clifton av, over
private right-of-way through Windsor Hills to Hillsdale,
over private right-of-way, following Forrest av, (Wetherds-
ville Road), to Windsor Mill Road, Kernans Drive, Logwood
Road, to Lorraine Cemetery. Returning via same route.

BUS LINE ROUTES

Route A—Charles St. Line—Charles and 39th: Charles, Uni-
versity Parkway, Greenway, Charles, Baltimore, Light,
Redwood, to Charles. Returning, Charles, to University
Parkway, 39th, Charles.

Route B—Mt. Royal Ave. Line—Charles and Baltimore Sts:
Charles, Chase, Cathedral, Mt. Royal av, Lanvale, Park
av, Reservoir. From Park av and Reservoir, one branch
is routed over Reservoir, Brookfield av, Eutaw pl, Clover-
dale av, Madison av to Brooks la, Brookfield av, Reservoir,
to Park av, then south over same route as above to Balti-
more, Light, Redwood, Charles st loop. From Park av
and Reservoir another branch is routed over Reservoir to
Callow av, to Park ter, to Park av, to Reservoir then south
over the same route as above. §

Route C—Alameda Line—Fenwick and 33rd : Fenwick, Chilton,
Alameda blvd, to Harford av. Returning, Harford av,
Tivoly av, 28th, Alameda blvd, 33rd, to Fenwick av.

Route D—Bentalou-Monroe Sts Line—Washington Blvd and
Monroe: Monroe, Ramsay, Payson, Edmondson av, Benta-
lou, Windsor av, Smallwood, Clifton av, Bentalou. Return-
ing over same route to Washington blvd and Monroe. ;

Route E——Randallstown Line—Gwynn Oak and Liberty Heights
Avs: Over Liberty rd to Randallstown.

Route F—Chester St Line—North Av and Chester: North av,
Collington av, Lafayette av, Chester, Madison, Milton av,
McElderry, Linwood av, Baltimore, East av, Elliott,
Clinton to foot of Clinton st, (Newgate av). Returning
same route,

Route G—E Fayette St Line—Lombard and Eaton : Lombard,
Conkling, Baltimore, Ellwood av, Fayette, Holliday, Lex-
ington, Liberty, Cathedral, Centre, to Howard. Returning,
Howard, Fayette, then east over same route.as above.

‘Route H—North Point Road Line—Eastern av and North

Point rd: North Point rd, Sparrows Point rd, to 4th and
D (Sparrows Point). Returning, same route.

Route I-— Dolfield Av Line — Belvieu and Belvedere Avs:
Belvieu, Garrison, Dolfield, Hilton, Gwynns Falls pkwy,
Longwood, Westwood av, North av, Longwood, then
northward.

Route J—Morrell Park-Lansdowne Line—Wade’s Ball Field,
Lansdowne: Hammonds Ferry rd, Washington blvd. to
No. 27 Line terminus, Morrell Park. Returning, same
route,

Route K — Lakeland-Baltimore Highlands-Westport Line —
Annapolis Rd and Annapolis Av (Westport) : Annapolis
av, Hollins Ferry rd, Arbutus av, Annapolis rd, Ohio av,
to Brian av. Returning, Ohio av, Annapolis rd, Arbutus
av, Hollins Ferry rd, Annapolis av, Westport av, Maisel,
to Annapolis rd and Annapolis av.

Route L—Reisterstown Road Line—Park Heights Av and Cold
Spring La: Cold Spring la, Reisterstown rd to Seven Mile
la. Returning, Reisterstown rd, Wylie av, Park Heights
av, to Cold Spring la.

Route of Brighton Branch—Park Heights Av and Cold Spring
La: Reisterstown rd, Patterson av, Parr av, Ridge av,
Brighton av, to Patterson av. Returning, Patterson av,
Reisterstown rd, Wylie av, Park Heights av, to Cold
Spring la.

Route M—Belvedere Loop-Pikesville-Glyndon Line—Belvedere
loop, Belvedere av, Park Heights av, passing Manhattan
loop (terminus No. 5 line) Slade av, Reisterstown rd, to
Owings Mills, Reisterstown, Dover rd, to Glyndon and
Emory Grove. Returning over same route.

Route N—West Baltimore Street Line: one branch—West
Baltimore st loop, Baltimore st, Hilton, Franklin, Den-
nison, Edmondson av, Hilton, Baltimore st, to loop:
another branch—West Baltimore st loop, Baltimore st,
Caton av, Kossuth, Old Frederick rd, Monastery av,
Caton av, Baltimore st, to loop.

Route O-—Homeland Line—St. Paul St and University Park-
way : University Parkway, Charles, St. Albans way, Pad-
dington, Springlake, St. Dunstans, St. Albans way, Bel-
vedere av. Returning, Belvedere av, St. Albans way,
Charles, 39th, St. Paul to University Parkway.

Route P—Back-Middle River Line—Pratt and Grundy Sts:
Grundy St., Eastern Ave., to Middle River Bridge. Re-
turning Eastern Ave.,, Haven, Pratt, to Pratt and
Grundy Sts.

Route Q—Orleans St Viaduct-Halethorpe Line—Halethorpe,
Francis av, Oregon av, East Drive, Linden av, Leeds av,
Wilkins av, Gilmor, Lombard, Liberty, Cathedral, Frank-
lin, over Viaduct, Orleans, Broadway, Monument, Patter-
son Park av, North av, Milton av, Lanvale, Patterson
Park av, Monument, Broadway, Orleans, over Viaduct,
Franklin, Cathedral, Liberty, Redwood, Eutaw, Lombard
to Halethorpe. ‘

Route R—Carney Line—Harford rd and Lavender av to Har-
ford and Joppa rds ; returning same route.

Route S—Liberty Heights Av-Druid Park Dr Line—Druid
Park dr, Hooper, 41st, 40th, University rkwy, 39th, Ellers-
lie, 36th, Ednor, 33rd, 32nd, Harford, Erdman, Edison
highway, Madison, Highland, Bank, Grundy, Eastern,
Conkling, Bank. Returning via same route.

Route T—Northwood Bus Line—Greenmount av and 33rd, east
on 33rd, to Alameda blvd, to Loch Raven blvd, to Pent-
ridge rd. Returning to Loch Raven blvd, to Argonne
drive, to Roundhill rd, to Loch Raven blvd. to Alameda,
to 33rd, to Barclay, to 33rd and Greenmount av terminus.

Route U-—Mannasota Av Line—Belair Rd and Erdman Av:
Belair rd, Mayfield, Mannasota, Parkside, Brehm’s la,
Dudley, Manrasota, Erdman, to Belair rd.

Route V-—Armistead Gardens Line—Monument’and Kresson

St. to Philadelphia Rd., to Horner’s Lane (Armistead

Garde_ns) to Leipold Way, to Armistead Way, to Phila-
